snippet: The publisher Other Criteria will issue a comprehensive catalog of the paintings this spring.
abstract: Publisher Other Criteria plans to issue a comprehensive catalog of Damien Hirst's whimsical spot paintings, which the artist began in 1986.
lead_paragraph: The publisher Other Criteria will issue a comprehensive catalog of the paintings this spring.

headline.main: A Catalog Will Detail Hirst’s Spot Paintings
headline.print_headline: A Catalog Will Detail Hirst’s Spot Paintings
